data.message: Hey Facebook  - I'm having repeated problems with a post I shared on my personal timeline - it keeps reposting and showing up over and over - I now have 11 iterations of it, and I've deleted as many if not more. It also repeatedly shows up in the public feed almost every time I click to that page. No legit response from FB support other than a canned message. Please make it stop, I feel like I'm living in a cross between Poltergeist and Ground Hog's Day!

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing this, Carolyn. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, please report it to us using these steps: http://bit.ly/2behpQA. Thanks. -Jordan

Facebook yup, did that, and got this bot-message: "Your feedback will be used to improve Facebook. Thanks for taking the time to make a report." Meanwhile, I'm continuing to get the same post after post after post on my timeline. Is there another course of action?
